alternateName: Scraped Jobs from Linkedin. Augmented with Job Skills

distribution.name: archive.zip
distribution.description: Archive containing all the contents of the Data Analyst Job Postings dataset

distribution.name: postings.csv
distribution.description: A dataset containing data analyst job postings collected from LinkedIn. Includes job titles, company names, job locations, job links, dates of first sighting, search city and country, job levels, job types, job summaries, and required job skills.

field.name: job_title
field.description: The title of the job posting. (type: str)

field.name: company
field.description: The name of the company. (type: str)

field.name: job_location
field.description: The location of the job (city, state, or country). (type: str)

field.name: job_link
field.description: The URL link to the job posting. (type: str)

field.name: first_seen
field.description: The date when the job posting was first seen. (type: datetime)

field.name: search_city
field.description: The city used as a search keyword to find the job posting. (type: str)

field.name: search_country
field.description: The country used as a search keyword to find the job posting. (type: str)

field.name: job level
field.description: The level of the job (e.g., entry-level, mid-level, senior-level). (type: str)

field.name: job_type
field.description: The type of job (e.g., full-time, part-time, contract). (type: str)

field.name: job_skills
field.description: Skills mentioned in the job. Extracted via NER (type: list)

recordSet.name: postings.csv
recordSet.description: A dataset containing data analyst job postings collected from LinkedIn. Includes job titles, company names, job locations, job links, dates of first sighting, search city and country, job levels, job types, job summaries, and required job skills.

keywords: subject > people and society > jobs and career
subject > people and society > jobs and career > employment
subject > people and society > jobs and career > income
subject > science and technology > computer science
name: Data Analyst Job Postings
description: Data science is a rapidly growing field in the tech industry, and LinkedIn is a popular platform for finding job opportunities in this domain. This dataset provides valuable insights into data analyst job postings, including the required skills and software proficiency sought by employers. > If you find this dataset useful, don't forget to hit the upvote button! 😊💝 ### Checkout my top datasets - [Top Spotify Songs in 73 Countries](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/asaniczka/top-spotify-songs-in-73-countries-daily-updated) - [Wages by Education in the USA](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/asaniczka/wages-by-education-in-the-usa-1973-2022) - [Amazon Products Dataset (1.4M Products)](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/asaniczka/amazon-products-dataset-2023-1-4m-products) - [TMDB 950K Movies](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/asaniczka/tmdb-movies-dataset-2023-930k-movies) - [Amazon Kindle Books (130K Books)](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/asaniczka/amazon-kindle-books-dataset-2023-130k-books) ## Interesting Task Ideas: 1. Analyze the most in-demand skills and software for data analyst positions. 2. Find common job titles in the data science field. 3. Explore the geographical distribution of data engineering job opportunities. 4. Identify the most sought-after skills --- Photo by Lukas Blazek on Unsplash
